t: I've tried at least 7 brands of bubbles: This is tops!
s: I have listed comments under each brand regarding my experiences. Magic Bubbles New Magic Bubbles 32 oz Premium Bubbles -Very good solution AND wand. -As far as I know, only available from Amazon. -Come in large, 32 ounce bottle. -I have sometimes used five large, full breaths to empty the wand of bubbles; they are THAT good! (Will attach video showing this!) -Require very little air pressure to make lots of bubbles. -Good in bubble machines, but there are better ...
